name: UpdatePullRequestReviewProtection
description:
Update pull request review protection settings for a branch.

This tool allows updating the pull request review enforcement settings on a protected branch, requiring admin or owner permissions. It applies to branches in both public and private repositories with enabled branch protection settings.

parameters.name: repository_owner_name
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. This value is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: branch_name
parameters.description: The name of the branch to update. It must not contain wildcard characters. For wildcard support, use the GraphQL API.

value_schema.description: The name of the branch. Cannot contain wildcard characters. To use wildcard characters in branch names, use [the GraphQL API](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/graphql).

parameters.name: pr_review_protection_settings
parameters.description: JSON object defining bypass allowances, dismissal restrictions, and review requirements for pull request review protection.

apps.description: The list of app `slug`s allowed to bypass pull request requirements.

teams.description: The list of team `slug`s allowed to bypass pull request requirements.

users.description: The list of user `login`s allowed to bypass pull request requirements.

bypass_pull_request_allowances.description: Allow specific users, teams, or apps to bypass pull request requirements.

dismiss_stale_reviews.description: Set to `true` if you want to automatically dismiss approving reviews when someone pushes a new commit.

apps.description: The list of app `slug`s with dismissal access

teams.description: The list of team `slug`s with dismissal access

users.description: The list of user `login`s with dismissal access

dismissal_restrictions.description: Specify which users, teams, and apps can dismiss pull request reviews. Pass an empty `dismissal_restrictions` object to disable. User and team `dismissal_restrictions` are only available for organization-owned repositories. Omit this parameter for personal repositories.

require_code_owner_reviews.description: Blocks merging pull requests until [code owners](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/articles/about-code-owners/) have reviewed.

require_last_push_approval.description: Whether the most recent push must be approved by someone other than the person who pushed it. Default: `false`

required_approving_review_count.description: Specifies the number of reviewers required to approve pull requests. Use a number between 1 and 6 or 0 to not require reviewers.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The name of the branch. Cannot contain wildcard characters. To use wildcard characters in branch names, use [the GraphQL API](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/graphql).

users.description: The list of user `login`s with dismissal access

dismissal_restrictions.description: Specify which users, teams, and apps can dismiss pull request reviews. Pass an empty `dismissal_restrictions` object to disable. User and team `dismissal_restrictions` are only available for organization-owned repositories. Omit this parameter for personal repositories.

require_code_owner_reviews.description: Blocks merging pull requests until [code owners](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/articles/about-code-owners/) have reviewed.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
